website_summaries.verdict: The Monster iSport Freedom is designed to withstand a serious workout, but this wireless Bluetooth headphone pair has a peculiar sound signatureâ€”and costs too much.
pros: Powerful audio performance with no distortion on deep bass tracks
cons: Overly sculpted sound signature is often too bright with weak midrange presence

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor comfort and very big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, poor comfort and very big and heavy. Rubber mufflers took a while getting used to but turned out to be a good design feature for exercising.
customer_reviews.author: S. B

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning them as the sound quality is not great.
customer_reviews.text: The green looks slightly tacky, and they hurt after a while of wearing them. Will be returning them as the sound quality is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 4 months - avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Failed after just 4 months, sound just packed up. Amazon returns were easy and the headphones were comfy to wear and sound quality good, but obviously not reliable hence 1 star. Monster need to up their build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Will admit that I was a tad disappointed on the low end noise when I first purchased
customer_reviews.text: Had this product 2 and a half years now. Will admit that I was a tad disappointed on the low end noise when I first purchased. However, after all this time wearing most days as well as regularly in the Gym / whilst running, there are still no notable defects or drop off in quality. Very happy. For an active sportsperson these headphones have done a fantastic job
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: quailty build and great bass
customer_reviews.text: Had these for almost two years used 3 times a week for workouts. Quailty buiild and the sound is great nice deep base.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Ive has these for donkeys years and absolutely bashed them about. They sound quality is good (very loud which I like) and they stay on your head when boxing training (which is why I bought them). They’re big though and heavy but that doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: kimon a spyrou

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Husband at Christmas and he's very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Husband at Christmas and he's very happy with them. No issues of hang ups with them at all. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eve W

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for running and fitness. Really good sound! Even compared to my focals.
customer_reviews.author: Bobstoph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recommend 100% this product .. very good and seller service is also excellent .. thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Pla Mabilia

customer_reviews.title: Unconformable if wearing them more than 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: They are good in many aspects, but overall I find them too uncomfortable if I wear them more than 30-40 minutes because of their pressure on the outer ears. For the first 30 minutes of training, they are just fine. But afterwards the outer ears pain is increasing. After 50 minutes, the pain becomes too strong and I have to give them down.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and were deliveried before the expected date. I would recommend these to any one who wants a decent set of headphones to go running with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats
customer_reviews.text: This is 10 times better than beats and really perfect for RUNNING even under rain. I reccomend strongly to whoever wants to buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: TAYLAN CELTIK

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, yes, but very good quality & sweat proof as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa gough

customer_reviews.title: There are better choises
customer_reviews.text: Very simple Bluetooth headphones, not good for running or jugging, Its not monster quality product , for wireless headset not bad !
customer_reviews.author: nawaf alromaihi

customer_reviews.title: Not good for outdoor exercise in wet weather
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a while now and use them for running outside. When the weathers fine they work perfectly but when it’s wet & windy they just stop working. Once you are back home inside they work again. It’s so annoying as I specifically bought them for outdoor running.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Redhead

customer_reviews.title: They are good but...
customer_reviews.text: They are good but the manufacturer marketing policie is not. If you pay 200 dollars dor headphones you are expecting to get a spare earpads like every other brand do. But not here,Monster does not handle spare cushions so if you brake yours because those are with thinny rubber and its easy to, you supposed to buy a whole new pair of headphones just for broken earpad. And the funny thing is that Monster sells spare ear pads but for other models not exact this one... Its like they care just to sell the product but not the longterm customers satisfaction...Thats just not right id give one star for the manifacture and 5 for the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Teodosi Tsvetkov

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for 8 months but don't buy if you need for longer
customer_reviews.text: Started out great. Wife loved it for running, phone calls. Then the mic stopped working. Tech supports answer was: you can return for a replacement EXCEPT you bought it on Amazon. So no, you can't. I own Bose, Plantronics, Sony, Beats, etc and have never been as dissatisfied as I am with Monster. I will not be buying their products again.
customer_reviews.author: mjmd

customer_reviews.title: The best part about them is that the bluetooth signal is ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews but these headphones are worth the notice. I have had them for 4 or 5 months and have not had a single problem. The best part about them is that the bluetooth signal is almost always strong. I had a pair of Bose and it lightly rained one day and killed the battery. And the signal falter regularly. That won't happen with these. They are comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I don't like ear buds, they hurt my ears after a while. Needed over ear for the gym. These actually stay on your head even while lying down on a bench. Very sweat resistant, they don't cover your ear so they're not great at keeping out other sound but that's fine, they don't make your ears sweat.. definitely not for audiophiles. Not bad sound, about what you'd expect for sports headphones.. I have been using them 5 days a week for 2 months with no issues, good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: perfect for running
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for about 3 weeks. I run 5-6 days a week and I use these headphones every day. My ears don't hold onto earbuds---I have tried them all and NO earbuds (cheap, expensive, NONE) stay in my ears. The sound is great, the controls are easy and I recharge once a week. Recharging takes less than an hour. There's no slipping, they're not too tight, and they fit over top of a baseball cap with ease (to keep sun out of my eyes & rain off of my face). I would totally recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: tpiscesgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for workout and liesure
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pair for over a year. They're still going strong and the batteries are still excellent. Good for gym use and haven't deteriorated with all the sweat. They tend to slip a bit from the ears once the wearer's face becomes sweaty. Sound quality is good. I think wireless playback bass quality seemed better. I didn't like the supplied pouch and had to purchase a hard headphone case for it. The lemon green part of the headphones tend to easily get dirty and this is after I realised there was a black coloured set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE WORKOUT TOOL
customer_reviews.text: These things have been amazing and for years they have stood up to sweat and dropping and bending and it's been great. Also the color means I never lose them. If you can still get these I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Donte A

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym and they are awesome! Battery life is great. I usually work out 1-2 hours and they always last. If your phone rings while you're working out it'll chime to notify you. I've had them a couple years and they still work like new
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones that have stood the test of time
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a pair of over ear headphones that you can work out with comfortably (lift, run, erg, plie) and still rock in your day by day existence; you've met your match. I really couldn't ask for more than these headphones. I've been using and abusing these bad boys for over 3 years and they still work like new (I'm a pretty big dude and tend to break things). The headphones don't slip or slid, I never have to readjust them and they still sound great. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Winthrop

customer_reviews.title: A must-have in fitness audio!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the (wireless) audio arsenal in my gym bag! The adjustable headset makes a comfortable fit, even if I decide to wear a hat. The sound is amazing, enough bass so I feel the music pulsing through my workout, and 95% of outside noise is non-existent. Can't wait to use them on a run. If you're looking for an over-the-ear headset, I'd recommend giving these a whirl :)
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Best audio purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best audio purchase ever, best purchase ever. Fantastic sound, lows and highs. The charge lasts a very long time, 10 hours plus a week. They are very durable, they've rattled around in my gym bag with no I'll Effect. I have sweat like crazy in them, running stairs, box jumping road running and these never slip, not once. Fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with these! I bought these after my last BT headphones bit the dust. I've had them for a couple of months now and I am very impressed. The sound quality is fantastic with lots of bass. They seem to be well constructed to this point. I use them primarily for working out and so far, so good! Only minor issue is when I sweat they can tend to slip off if doing things like sit-ups or crunches but other than that they really work great!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Where's the bass?
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are decent, but are a little bit annoying in that there is no bass. In order to hear the bass on a lot of songs I need to turn the volume up to a point that the treble becomes too high and bothers my ears
customer_reviews.author: psalms8318

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These were great. I gifted them to someone with small ears and these were like a glass slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. I am very happy with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, superior sound. Battery holds very well. Product doesn't seem to be bothered by sweating all over it. It is easy to use, clean and pair with your phone. I only wish if the Previous / Next song buttons were easier to use. It will take you some time to kind of guess where the buttons are to be able to press them while running.
customer_reviews.author: Milos

customer_reviews.title: Really like these headphones for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Really like these headphones for the gym. The sound is good and so is the bluetooth connection. For whatever reason I do notice that if I run with my armband on for my ipod the headphones seem to break up during the songs. So instead I just put the armband in my pocket and it went away. That was the only issue I really found with these. Pretty expensive but they definitely work well for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for your workout
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect gym headphones and after a month of reading reviews I found them! I love these headphones! They are compatible with the iphone 6s and iphone 7. These babies stick on throughout an entire sweaty workout. I can't believe that I have never used wireless headphones before. Complete game changer! The sound gets better the more you break them in. They are durable, light and easy. GREAT Product! IG: @Fitnessonthereal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This did NOT connect to my headphones through Bluetooth but did connect to my iPad...
customer_reviews.author: Kami Bovell

customer_reviews.title: Second pair broken, not covered under warranty!!
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing these headphones in June 2014, I am on my second pair. The first pair was covered under the warranty due to no sound, now the second pair (which I received in Oct 2015) is doing the same thing. NO SOUND. Very disappointed this isn't covered under the warranty, being its the same problem. Especially spending almost $200. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sirdwilly

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These Monster headphones are great! Knocks out all gym chatter and the sound is great for bluetooth. I have owned Jaybirds and Motorola wireless and these are the best sounding by far. Battery life has been great and quick recharge. Only drawback's are that your ears get warm after a period of use and will not all song control my rhapsody account on my Philips Go Connect. Small price to pay for quality. Very glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Roger Key

customer_reviews.title: Great set if Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Had these headphones for about a month now and love them. The fit snug to the eat and aren't going anywhere. Sound awesome. After about 45 minutes to hour plus ears get warm or tight but doesn't bother me. Love that I can also plug wire in if I want to use Aux line vs Bluetooth. Allows me to listen to TV on the treadmill if I want. Range is pretty good as phone is in locker and I don't have much problem with connectivity. Price was 199 with shipping but worth it for waterproof and wireless in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Edward Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I have the option of bluetooth or wired. This is really convenient just in case the power runs out. The sound is more than adequate for gym use. Great addition to my workout gear.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good while they last
customer_reviews.text: High marks while they worked. Good sound quality. Good set of controls on the ear cups. But they stopped working after a little under two years of not very intense use--30-45 minutes on an exercise bike two to three times a week.
customer_reviews.author: TYC

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad build quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use at the gym. I sweat a lot. These are sweat resistant. That is the best part. However, after one month the battery was unable to hold a charge for more than 1.5 hours. Okay, I charge them everyday. I can deal with that. After 6 months the right ear cut out. I have been living with that for several months but it really is not a good situation. An expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Gilden L.

customer_reviews.title: Best gym headphones I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with these headphones. They stay on my head whether I'm mowing the lawn or weightlifting. They provide good sound quality w/incredible durability and I'm impressed with the battery life. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J

customer_reviews.title: Great sweat resistance
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a long time for exercise headphones that aren't in-ear (since they are bad for your hearing) and this is the best pair I've found so far. The sweat-resistant build is admirable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aetoss

customer_reviews.title: Great durability
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a couple years now and they weren't great the sound is fantastic. They get a little bit uncomfortable after you wear them for a long time but the sweat resistance and quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: If you sweat when you exercise don't get these pieces of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible - too loose for working out the slide everywhere, I have to look like a tool and wear a head band over them to keep in place. If you sweat when you workout don't get these. After 6 months of use headphones already wont work, I bought an extended warranty so will see where that gets me. Even if they send me another pair the same thing will happen, these are by far and away the biggest pieces of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Battery started to last 20 minutes fully charged the third ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery started to last 20 minutes fully charged the third week of use, tried to contact the customer service several times and they never answered. Paid 150 bucks for a pair of wireless headphones that weren't wireless more than three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Matonte

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth headphone that stay on while jumping around!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love these Bluetooth on ear headphones. I do a lot of bouncing around in the gym. Box Jumps, Squat Jumps, Plank Jacks, Speed Skaters, etc the headphones stay in place the whole time. They never ever fall off. After my workout, I then run on treadmill about 6 miles while streaming tv episodes with my headphones on. No problem at all with them. And most importantly they offer great sound. I've had these since August 2015 and have nothing but a great experience with them. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey W.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. They have held up to 5 days per ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the sweat resistance and bluetooth connectivity. So far so good. They have held up to 5 days per week at the gym with heavy sweat. I bought them several months ago and no issues so far. Sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Oaken

customer_reviews.title: super nice gym headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are super nice, and loud enough for me at the gym. Gets a bit sweaty on the ears. They fit well, and I have had no problems with them falling off. Sound quality is decent. I took one star off because they highs are a little too pronounced. Perfect for working out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem bulky but can't even tell when running.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that the headphones would not be comfortable for running given the bulky size, but you don't even notice it. Great sound and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not for runners
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for jogging. I run about 20 miles a week. From the first day, they had to be taped up with duct tape or they rattled too loudly to listen to any music. Taped up, they worked well for four months, then began to cut out and quit working. Now at 5 months, they no longer work at all. They will not hold up to 20 miles per week jogging.
customer_reviews.author: BDC

customer_reviews.title: Convined ...thought it was just the brand but worth it...
customer_reviews.text: about me-fitness enthusiast....ok so at first i was a bit skeptical about these....but after using them all i can say is that they are worth it even though they are a bit overpriced....any cons are far outweighed by the convenience of these things....and the wireless part works damn well....first time in a while i did not not have any hassle with changing music....well worth your money as they stay on well...fit is a bit weird but in a good way....sound quality is decent but not great....overall a decent wireless headphone for working out....
customer_reviews.author: bharath rao polsani

customer_reviews.title: Great product - cool rubbery feel - good sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound good and feel nice, just not what I was looking for. I bought the Sony 950 over-ear extra bass.
customer_reviews.author: the _hung3r_james

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones! 10 out of 10 would buy again (have bought again)
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome. They sync easily, sound awesome, and seal out outside noise extremely well. Both my wife and I use them and we both love running and lifting in them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Boomin'
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my teen. He loves them but it took a few minutes to figure out the sync with the flashing red and blue lights. He likes the base and we both like the blue tooth or corded option. Not the "beats" phones as everyone else, but better as these are from the original company.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: He's super happy with them and that's a pretty resounding endorsement
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband, who's fussy about headphones and wanted to listen to metal (loud) while lifting weights and running. He's super happy with them and that's a pretty resounding endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Swartz

customer_reviews.title: My honest opinion
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these headphones for about a month but I have no complaints. They're comfortable and not too big or small. The battery life is incredible and it doesn't take too long to charge either. However, if you are very picky about sound quality these headphones are mediocre. Other than that no complaints, extremely worth the price I paid for these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, bad Bluetooth connection, crack with use.
customer_reviews.text: After a while the headphones crack around your head where they expand and become lose. Not worth the price. Also the bluetooth cuts in and out. These may be the crappiest head phones I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jed C Lechner

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for Fitness/Working Out
customer_reviews.text: Interesting how they were designed for working out yet they constantly keep falling out of position...Not happy I guess I'm trying Beats New buds next after Jaybirds let me down as well (connection problems, skipping...)
customer_reviews.author: Sitka Gear Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far these work like a charm...I workout with them and run with them
customer_reviews.author: Brain friend

customer_reviews.title: I like these headphones a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones a lot. I use them when exercising. They stay in place and are comfortable. When the ear pads get sweat on them, there is not any issue with the sound. Overall sound is very good although this is my first pair of wireless so I don't have anything to compare them to. Overall, easy to use and pair with bluetooth. My younger kids think they're cool and want to use them, so they must be fashionable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Pavia

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return it
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and clunky for a sport headphone not to mention price! Would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Keshavarz

customer_reviews.title: Live these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time! I love these wireless heaphones specially when i work out i dont have to worry about no cables. Battery life is good and the audio quality is great, headphones are really light and you dont get that ear pressure like other heaphones do. I like the fact i can skip/ pause and play right from the headphone itself and even answer calls, id ouck these over the beats any day and plus they are sweat proof. Too bad it doesnt come in any other colors but overall these headphones are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Armando Patino

customer_reviews.title: Why do people by Beats if these exist.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. The quality is great and they are perfect for my active lifestyle. I use them for walks,runs,dancing and cleaning my house. They are so easy to clean. I exercise in a warmer climate so being able to wipe the sweat off them every time us important to me. I have used them in light to medium rain and they have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Delores W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a year. Battery life and sound never deteriorated. Used them almost daily. Unfortunately the right side stopped working for no apparent reason. I opened them and checked the connections. They seem to be fine. Good product, apparently not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy ... Bluetooth doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: They stopped working after 6 months. I can't pair them with anything. I reset them once and they worked, but now all I get is a flashing blue and orange light and they won't pair with any of my devices.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Honig

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed, But Just Too Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit, the look, and I thought they sounded just fine, but there were too many times when the signal would cut out briefly from the distance of my front pocket to my head. If that hadn't happened as often as it did, I would have happily kept these.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with one device
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with one device, but I can't get it to connect to another via bluetooth? Sound is good and haven't had any problems with it otherwise. Would definitely recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a second pair for my friend because at first they seemed fine but he also had the same problem. They fell apart and the battery barely holds.
customer_reviews.author: Radia

customer_reviews.title: I really liked them, and they worked great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones one year ago. I really liked them, and they worked great. However, I haven't been in the gym for several months, so hadn't been using them. I just returned in the past week, but can't get the headphones to charge. Revising my review and changing from 2stars to 4 as i did finally get the headphones to charge, just took much longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but not enough bass for me. Well made and the functionality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Woodbridge

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: After two years of use with care the right side got scratchy and stopped working making them completely useless and harmful to my ear drums. Not sure what the warranty covers but I will try to contact them. Hopefully they will replace it for me.
customer_reviews.author: UZAIR

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! I sweat in them at least twice a week in the gym for the past year and they are still performing as new. Sound is pretty good and they stay on my head even when bench pressing. Great addition to my training.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Woodard

customer_reviews.title: No replacement parts available
customer_reviews.text: $200 is a large investment in headphones- only to find that monster offers zero replacement parts for them. Had I known that Monster does not offer continued support- I wouldn’t have bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my BEATS sound better, and that is obvious to a non
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife. Durable and sporty, but not gonna lie, my BEATS sound better, and that is obvious to a non audiophile. I tried to research good workout headphones and bought these because of some good reviews. As time has gone on, I actually hate these headphones. The battery, after being fully charged , runs out after 1 workout. These are crap. There are so many better choices. Such a hassle to maintain that we will likely buy a different pair, so cost us more in the long run too. My other pair is BEATS. Had them longer and they still work perfectly. My monsters are lightly used and they SUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Maester

customer_reviews.title: they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 15 year old son. I tried them on myself and was very impressed. Wireless is definitely the way to go and the quality of sound is exceptional. We are still holding out to see how durable the headphones are, but after a month of a 15 year old's use, they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Duncan

customer_reviews.title: This used to be great no problems I some how broke 1st pair bought ...
customer_reviews.text: This used to be great no problems I some how broke 1st pair bought another this pair will not stay paired or charged I want to send back beware
customer_reviews.author: Jay A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not as tight as I thought around the ears, but not too loose, its just a smidge under just right, but they will stay on unless you do some violent shaking lol. Highly recommended as these are durable, flexible and sound fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Warren Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Green with envy!  Now I own a pair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome love taking these to the gym. Does not fall off when I'm jogging. A Must have. Sound is incredible
customer_reviews.author: Lakers4Real

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for sitting on the couch but not working out.
customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy, amplify the sound of each step I take and only am able to drown that out by turning the volume to maximum, and they fall off when I bend over. As noted in other reviews, the sound is mediocre, but I was not buying these for sound quality. I was hoping they would be lighter and not make so much noise. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: love em.....my 2nd pair only didnt have a hard shell case before so these new ones will last forever
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones, Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones and at a great price. I connect them to my apple watch all of the time and listen to music while I run. They stay on my head during the most action packed workouts. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend these headphones. They began dropping the blue tooth signal and not properly charging after 3 months of use. For me, I enjoyed the headphones for 3 months, but ultimately just a waste of money and added to the wantabe sport headphone graveyard pile. Keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: BlueSurf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Was a present for my husband. He loves them and runs 5 miles a day without any issues of slipping. Says they have good sound quality, which they do. Excellent purchase and excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Jax B

customer_reviews.title: she tells everyone how great they are
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for the wife last Christmas, she tells everyone how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: thisguy

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is pretty good. Some color options would have been nice
customer_reviews.text: I've had my headphones about 2 years and it's still working perfectly. The sound quality is pretty good. Some color options would have been nice, but I still love these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: I love theese headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love theese headphones. I bought for the gym because I sweat alot, and I havent had any problems. I walk out in snowy Boston in the cold and they also have not given me any problems. The controls on the right side of the headphones are easy to use. I also love having the option of connecting the audio wire if the battery starts running low
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pabon

customer_reviews.title: Would not hold a charge after a couple uses, ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not hold a charge after a couple uses, had to use the cord which defeated the purpose of going Bluetooth. Bummed
customer_reviews.author: Jason spalding

customer_reviews.title: Issue with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Priced well. Sweatproof and fit well. However, bluetooth stopped working after a while. Well, it works for everything except MY phone now. And its not my phone. Phone works just fine with other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are very comfortable for a 30-60 minute workout
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable for a 30-60 minute workout. The sound is superb and I love the long battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Richards

customer_reviews.title: Grrrr! I shoulda bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my husband months ago and they were only $89!!! He absolutely loves them so I came back to get myself some and this price is so not cool.
customer_reviews.author: taressa leeks

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm am an addict of buying headphones, the sound to this is ok, glad they knocked off 100 bucks. Comfort is good for workout headphones, there is a nice add on to having the cord for when the battery runs out. These headphones are great could use some tweaks but since the price drop they are ok, at least I'm not planning to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great for a good workout.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were cheaper than Beats and they are also sweat resistant. I used them for mostly everything from the start. The sound quality is decent. They stay on your head tough workouts. I now mostly use them for workouts only as I have bought a pair of Beats Studio Wireless. They are great for the price and pair easily with most smartphones.
customer_reviews.author: BillyGoatZombie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I sweat a lot when I exercise, and I was afraid these headphones wouldn't be good enough...They are amazing! I used to be so frustrated with the cord of my old headphones getting tangled up while exercising on the elliptical, not such thing anymore with these. And the sound is excellent as well. Don't hesitate, get them. They're worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: Andres A. Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Good headset for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headset for the price. Sound quality is good and they fit snug, so stay put when running. I would recommend them if looking to spend in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful headphones for a sweaty gym junkie
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOOOVE these headphones!!! I just wish they got louder. :( I sweat like a monster at the gym five nights a week & these headphones are my BFF. Comfortable & beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: I helped a household member order these & he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I helped a household member order these & he loves them & uses them a lot. they work perfectly with his tablet pc.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love Monster.awewsome
customer_reviews.text: Monster does it again...great sound and style quality..luv hi vis yellow
customer_reviews.author: Tosa-Todd

customer_reviews.title: They don't hold charge and after a year and half ...
customer_reviews.text: They don't hold charge and after a year and half stopped charging completely. The warranty is only for one year and after there is NO REPAIR. Monster told me that they don't offer part. So, my only option now is to throw them away. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yulia Dultsina

customer_reviews.title: great when working only problem is they keep shutting off ...
customer_reviews.text: great when working only problem is they keep shutting off in the middle of my workout then I notice lots of other reviews with the same issue. Not with 10 bucks if they don't work, let alone 2 bills
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound and are very comfortable to wear. They don't slide around on my ears when working out. I love the fact that they are wireless.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out
customer_reviews.text: Monster is known for making quality headphone products, and these are no exception. When it comes to wireless on-ear headphones that are sweat-proof there aren't too many options and that's why I'm thankful monster made these. They have a very secure fit and are pretty much guaranteed to stay on your head for any type of workout you're doing. Now, compared to other other monster products the sound is somewhat underwhelming, a sacrifice they made I believe to increase the durability (sweat-proof) of the headphones. The tight fit may cause a little discomfort on your ear after you've been wearing them for a while, but that's a price I'm willing to pay headphones of this caliber.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cardobeast

product_meta.title: Monster iSport Freedom Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones - Green
product_meta.description:
THE WIRELESS WORKOUT
No wires. Nothing to hold you back. It’s where freedom of movement meets the power of music. iSport Freedom doesn’t have a cable. It’s just pure Monster audio. Let the soundtrack begin.

Freedom HeadphonesView larger View larger WHERE FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT MEETS THE POWER OF MUSIC
No wires. Nothing to hold you back. It’s where freedom of movement meets the power of music. iSport Freedom doesn’t have a cable. It’s just pure Monster audio. Let the soundtrack begin.

PURE AUDIO ADRENELINE
Delivers Pure Monster Sound while keeping you tuned to your surroundings. Next time you work up a sweat, lose the wire. Train harder. Run farther. Climb higher. Your workout has a soundtrack. Don’t miss a beat. The iSport Freedom.

FEATURES
Wireless on-ear headphones. Bluetooth (Apt-X + AAC) for exceptional wireless sound quality. Full-frequency response to help you achieve your workout goals. Water resistant, sweat-proof, and washable for everyday use. Superior design and construction—optimized for comfort and reliability. On-ear control buttons to power through your music with ease. ControlTalk Universal cable for listening in passive, battery-free mode. Reflective strip for enhanced reflective brightness at night.

SUPERIOR DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION
No wires. Nothing to hold you back. It’s where freedom of movement meets the power of music. iSport Freedom doesn’t have a cable. It’s just pure Monster audio. Let the soundtrack begin.



IN THE BOX
 * Freedom On-Ear Headphone
 * Protective Travel Pouch
 * Antimicrobial Cleaning Cloth
 * Micro USB to USB Cable
 * 3.5 mm Mini-to-mini
feature_bullets: Wireless on-ear headphones, can also be used with audio cable. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
Bluetooth (Apt-X + AAC) for exceptional wireless sound quality
Full-frequency response to help you achieve your workout goals
Water resistant, sweatproof, and cleanable for everyday use
Includes micro-USB charging cable & travel pouch
